name: King Roedran Almaric do Arreloa a'Naloy

chapters.title: Chapter 7: A Matter of Thought
chapters.info: King Roedran Almaric do Arreloa a'Naloy, p. 155 (208)—King of Murandy, at least in name. In reality, Murandians hold allegiance to lords only, and those lords often refuse to pay their taxes to the King.
